title: I/O Bio 100% Merino Wool Baby Kimono Shirt Sweater Knitted Striped top
features: Size 0-3 months - for height 50-56 cm (19,5 - 22 inches). Length of sweater 27 cm (10,5 inches), length of sleeve 16 cm (6 inches).
Size 3-6 months - for height 62-68 cm (24-27 inches). Length of sweater 34 cm (13,5 inches), length of sleeve 19 cm (7,5 inches).
Size 6-12 months - for height 74-80 cm (29-31 inches). Length of sweater 37 cm (14,5 inches), length of sleeve 21 cm (8,5 inches).
description: Sweater from Austrian brand "iobio" for your baby. All iobio production are natural, sustainable, affordable and made in Europe. With the certification in accordance with GOTS - Global Organic Textile Standard - the worldwide leading standard for natural textiles. All products meet a high level of environmental and social standard along the entire supply chain. This kimono sweater made from 100% merino wool. Fantastic to touch, very soft absolutely unscratchy wool knitted material - gentle - ideal for baby sensitive skin. Cute buttons make using super easy.
